Hi!

My name is Andra Zaharia and I’m writing to propose a cyber security product I believe could be useful and relevant for your readers.

Briefly, Heimdal PRO is a cyber threat protection suite which protects users against attacks that antivirus can’t block.

The product is powered by 3 key engines:

  1. The advanced malware engine - protects users against the newest and most sophisticated types of malware.
  2. The traffic scanning engine - protects users against Zero Hour exploits, dangerous web locations, malicious content from legitimate websites, cybercriminal attacks and data leakage.
  3. The patching engine, which automatically and silently installs updates for the critical software that the user has installed. Cyber criminals use vulnerabilities in software to launch 65% of their attacks, so this is a crucial feature for any Internet user.

Would you be interested in evaluating Heimdal PRO and see if it would make an appropriate recommendation for your readers?

Looking forward to your feedback!
